entry.title: Through Another's Eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Kilani

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,003Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 68

Summary: Stiles wakes up in a world that isn’t his—in a body that shouldn’t be his. Familiar faces surround him, yet everything feels wrong. Worst of all? He’s engaged to Derek Hale—a man he’s sure doesn’t like him, let alone want to marry him. With memories that aren’t his own and a past that doesn’t add up, Stiles must unravel the truth before he loses himself completely.

entry.title: Kings of a Purple Sea
entry.summary:
Author: Kca1516

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,726Chapters: 16/17Kudos: 334

Summary: Stiles and Derek are rival pirate captains, each trying to get one up on the other in an attempt to rule the seven seas.Derek is leader to the legendary Hale Pack. A ruthless family of werewolves who even the greatest fear.Stiles, The Sea Charmer, has his own cruel reputation - though no one has seen his true face as he hides in silks of dark blue wrappings.When a joint enemy threatens to take both crews out, will Stiles and Derek be able to put aside their differences and work together - or are they forever destined to burn in the water?

entry.title: Blood Magick
entry.summary:
Author: misfitmonarchy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,964Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 28

Summary: “Freeze! You--” Derek lunges and catches the wildling’s ankle. He grins, all teeth, and yanks the scrambling man so that the wildling’s body falls flat. It’s not too uncommon to find wildlings outside of cities, but they tended to wander the trade routes or at least areas with better shelter.The wildling’s arms are strong enough to fight back, and if he weren’t inhibited by his wolf’s strength, Derek presumes it would be quite a fight. As it were, he pinned the thief easily, chest down and flailing like a huffing like an animal.“Have nothing to say, thief?”--Derek and his pack of werewolves are fur traders working their way through the winter trading route when one evening, a thief is discovered after stealing their wares. Caught red handed, they take the thief prisoner and discover that the thief is much more than he seems

entry.title: Easy, Like
entry.summary:
Author: GodawfulSmallAffair

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,397Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 35

Summary: Stiles puts his slice of pizza back in the box and nudges Derek with his elbow. “Hey,” he says, when Derek looks at him, eyebrows up in question, “you wanna get dinner with me sometime?”Derek tilts his head to the side, a little furrow to his brow. “We’re having dinner right now.”“No, like a date.”__Stiles and Derek already know they make good friends. But they're thinking maybe they'd make even better lovers.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,820Chapters: 21/26Kudos: 270

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: The View Between Villages
entry.summary:
Author: EarlGreyBee

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,636Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 109

Summary: Stiles left Beacon Hills. Not because he wanted to, but because he needed to learn to control his magic. In a turn of events, he disappears from the packs lives, on the run and protecting a little girl from the dangers that haunt her. Running out of sleep, patience, and new countries to hide in, Stiles returns to Beacon Hills in hopes to stop running for good. He's tired of running. He wants his life back. He wants to see his dad again. He wants to see his friends again. And this little girl deserves a better family and childhood damn it.

entry.title: The Golden Question
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,309Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: A typical evening at the Hale loft takes a turn for the *hilariously* unhinged when Stiles, fueled by his insatiable curiosity (and possibly a little too much caffeine), decides to question werewolf instincts—specifically, their *marking* habits. His innocent yet outrageous inquiry about whether werewolves feel the urge to pee on their mates sends the room into chaos.Isabelle is left breathless from laughter, Peter watches in amused satisfaction, and Scott tries (and fails) to keep things from spiraling. Meanwhile, Liam wants *no* part of it, Ruby is ready to disappear, and Allison shuts down Stiles’ line of questioning with a deadpan response that only makes Isabelle laugh harder.But it’s Derek who finally puts an end to Stiles' antics—with a dangerously smooth, *unexpectedly* dominant retort that leaves Stiles completely speechless for once in his life. As the loft settles into a mix of laughter, tension, and unspoken challenges, Stiles is left with one very important lesson: *never ask a question you’re not prepared to have answered.*

entry.title: Stiles' Superhero
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,024Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 36

Summary: Stiles and Derek are enjoying a quiet evening walk in Beacon Hills when Stiles notices a stranger who bears an uncanny resemblance to Superman. The tall, broad-shouldered man’s confident aura strikes Stiles, and he can't help but be fascinated by the similarities between him and Derek. However, Derek’s protective instincts kick in as he senses Stiles’ lingering interest, sparking a wave of possessiveness in him. Teasingly, Stiles pushes Derek's buttons, flirting with the idea of being drawn to the mysterious stranger, but Derek isn't having it. In a moment of intense jealousy and desire, Derek makes it clear that Stiles is his and always will be. Their playful banter turns into a passionate moment of reassurance, as Derek stakes his claim on Stiles in the most possessive yet loving way. Through it all, Stiles is reminded that no one—Superman or otherwise—can compete with the alpha wolf who holds his heart.
